eventDescription.actionSelect: Emitted when a row action is selected
eventDescription.changeRowSelection: Emitted when the selected rows change
eventDescription.updateRequest: Emitted when server-side data needs to be requested

propsDescription.actionsMode: Controls how row actions are displayed
propsDescription.autoModeCount: Number of actions visible before switching to dropdown mode
propsDescription.dataActionMenu: List of actions available for each row
propsDescription.columnActionButtonLabel: Label for the column action button
propsDescription.customFormatters: Custom formatting functions for cell values
propsDescription.displayActions: Controls whether row actions are displayed
propsDescription.emptyTableMessage: Message shown when the table has no data
propsDescription.highlightActiveHeaderColumn: Highlights the currently active column header
propsDescription.id: Unique identifier required for persisting table state
propsDescription.inputDebounceTime: Debounce time for column filter inputs
propsDescription.isLoading: Displays a loading overlay on the table
propsDescription.isServerTable: Enables server-side pagination, sorting, and filtering
propsDescription.persistState: Persists table state across page reloads
propsDescription.persistStateStorage: Storage type used for persisting table state
propsDescription.rowPerPage: Default number of rows per page
propsDescription.rowPerPageOptions: Available options for rows per page
propsDescription.showResetButton: Shows reset button in the toolbar
propsDescription.tableOptions: Additional configuration options for the table
propsDescription.titleInfo: Configuration for table title and alignment
propsDescription.totalRecords: Total number of records for server-side tables
propsDescription.visibleColumns: Controls which columns are visible initially

slotDescription.footer: Slot for custom table footer content

label.deleteRecordMessage: You are going to delete this data.
label.deleteUserMessage: You are going to delete the user {user}.

subtitle: The table component is a flexible and powerful solution for managing and displaying tabular data.
title: Table

usage.customFilter: With custom filter component and server filterFn
usage.customHorizontalBorder: With custom style for horizontal border
usage.customStaticFilter: With custom filter component and static filterFn
usage.customVerticalBorder: With custom style for vertical border
usage.filteredActions: With actions menu items filtered based on row data logic
usage.persistentInstruction: Use the id and persistState props to make the table remember states such as sorting, filtering, and visible columns, even after a page refresh.
usage.title: With title
